analysis.description:
Reentrancy in TokenContinuousDistribution.release (/unique_chucks/10/0x35f517cab9a37bc31091c2f155d965af84e0bc85.sol#223-234):
	External calls:
	- unreleased = releasableAmount(token) (/unique_chucks/10/0x35f517cab9a37bc31091c2f155d965af84e0bc85.sol#225-227)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- released (/unique_chucks/10/0x35f517cab9a37bc31091c2f155d965af84e0bc85.sol#231-232)

TokenContinuousDistribution.distributedAmountWithBlockTimestamp (/unique_chucks/10/0x35f517cab9a37bc31091c2f155d965af84e0bc85.sol#252-295) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- unitsPassed < unitsIn1Phase.mul(4) (/unique_chucks/10/0x35f517cab9a37bc31091c2f155d965af84e0bc85.sol#283-295)
	- unitsPassed < unitsIn1Phase (/unique_chucks/10/0x35f517cab9a37bc31091c2f155d965af84e0bc85.sol#266-295)
	- unitsPassed < unitsIn1Phase.mul(2) (/unique_chucks/10/0x35f517cab9a37bc31091c2f155d965af84e0bc85.sol#271-295)
	- unitsPassed < unitsIn1Phase.mul(5) (/unique_chucks/10/0x35f517cab9a37bc31091c2f155d965af84e0bc85.sol#289-295)
	- blockTimestamp < cliff (/unique_chucks/10/0x35f517cab9a37bc31091c2f155d965af84e0bc85.sol#257-295)
	- unitsPassed < unitsIn1Phase.mul(3) (/unique_chucks/10/0x35f517cab9a37bc31091c2f155d965af84e0bc85.sol#277-295)
	- blockTimestamp >= endTime (/unique_chucks/10/0x35f517cab9a37bc31091c2f155d965af84e0bc85.sol#258-295)
	- require(bool,string)(blockTimestamp < endTime,Block timestamp is expected to have not reached distribution endTime if the code even falls in here.) (/unique_chucks/10/0x35f517cab9a37bc31091c2f155d965af84e0bc85.sol)

elements.expression: require(bool,string)(blockTimestamp < endTime,Block timestamp is expected to have not reached distribution endTime if the code even falls in here.)
